Things I gave to Counter-Strike:
1. Money
2. Time
3. Love

Things Counter-Strike gave me:
1. Arthritis
2. Rage
3. Hatred of Russians and Russians
4. Broken keyboard
5. Broken mouse
6. 9/10 ready
7. Server crashes
8. ?????? teammates
9. Competitive matches
10. "Ez Pz" spam
11. Multilingual cursing - I guess this is a good thing?
12. Lag
13. Cheaters
LEGEND! :D Nothing is as good as compared to 1.6

this is the best FPS first person shooter around, it might be an old one but still has extreme amount of players and servers online, it is this most real life shooter i have evry played and i recommend it for any FPS or first person shooters out there. HAPPY GAMING EVERYONE
Grande Jogo. Clássico, talvez nunca deixe de ser jogado.

Начнем с того что это за игра Counter – Strike.
 Контра (популярное название Counter – Strike) - это командный, стратегический 3D action там, где есть и Counter - Terrorist (хорошие) и Terrorist (плохие). Развязка событий (абезбашэное рубилово где на стенах кровь а на полу трупы) проходит на карте, которую сервер выбирает сам.
 Карты есть разных типов : de , cs , as, es , fy 
 De – это карты, где террористам надо заложить с4, а контрам по возможности разминировать.

The start of counter strike series it runs on the half life engine and is a great game]
you should get this with condition zero
One Of The Best Online Action Game!
Либо серверы с Моргенштерном при входе и свежем кабанчике при убийстве, либо бомбящие школьники в войсе. Ничего не поменялось, поэтому 10 из 10
This will be your best friend when your awesome pc/laptop breaks down.

I may not be good at this game but I consider this the perfect FPS.
Come on folks it's a Classic and still as busy as ever for online servers : )

The best competitive multiplayer FPS experience for low end computers.  Even an old laptop can run this probably.  Bit of a learning curve with weapons. Condition Zero expansion has Half-Life style campaign though not as groundbreaking, but also additional mp maps and a singleplayer bot mode that is goal oriented and challenging.
The original non-stop fun LAN party shooter! Glorious nostalgia.
one of the best online games

100%

Absolutely speechless, is what I am when I think of the Counter-Strike series. Look at this game, it was one of the most detailed FPS's for it's time and it still has it. No game series has been able to remake CS's addictiveness or its smooth gameplay. This game is one of the few titles that still requires skill, every weapon is earned and every weapon requires its own type of mastery. A truly great title that me and many others will return to play for a very long time.
